topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52f9cf2e6368723359a90000#post_52f9cf2e6368723359a90000
Yeah I know; what I meant was the ones that investigations honestly do not know are a good read on a saturday night.  You know, the ones that sound like they came right out of the x-files. (cheesy 1990's music suddenly playing)

The fbi has done investigations into ufos and other stuff; only a hand full every year actually don't have explanations to them.  Those are the best reads, cause they make you paranoid as fuck if you're reading it at night without the lights on.

topics.body:
On a side note after a geneva convention a unanimous decision I was years ago banned from ever telling any campfire stories, scaring people or having any sort of halloween costumes.

I don't scare anyone anymore, cause last time I scared someone I literally almost scared them to death.  If I was in charge of a haunted house for halloween they would need a ambulance just in case someone gets a heart attack.

topics.body:
"Pictured: the glory of EU4":http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=227134069

I have succesfully burned the British from the American east coast and have started colonization of Madagascar two-centuries early.

As well, India is semi-united in a single mega-state with fairly decent military tech (compared to my expectations) and the Ottomans have a east-heavy empire that scares me.

Ming are also rekt and the Manchus no longer exist. All the while Japan goes full-on Japanese Empire two-hundred years early.

topics.body:
Why is it that pro-immigration open borders types always argue as if you're in favor of 0 immigration.
I run in tough political circles where they won't even look at you if you believe in positive rights, but nobody believes in "no immigrants allowed ."
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52fbfa6263687212fa800000#post_52fbfa6263687212fa800000
Cause there's too many fucking idiots running around with racist signs and calling everyone that's a immigrants things like, "n****r", "w******k", "r*****d" and other shit.

I don't know what country you're from, but yeah considering how many times in texas I used to see tea party members going around saying, "I'm not racist, but we need to throw <massively offensive racial slur> back out of the country" or what's worse is when they go, "I'm not racist, but we need to send n*****rs back to africa".


Personally I'm on the fence when it comes to immigration, if it's a large country with a good economy then yeah having lots of immigrants is fine, but I can understand why switzerland is limiting immigration.  It doesn't have anything to do with racism; their economy just can't handle anymore immigrants right now.  Countries like the usa the number of immigrants we have is a drop in the bucket though and if every immigrant was thrown out of the country that would completely fuck up the economy again.  Countries like the usa immigration is good right now, but I understand why people in the EU want to limit immigration.

The problem is too many assholes are running around with racist signs and turning what was originally something that could have been handled calmly and peacefully into a hot button issue.  In other words people need to duct tape racists mouths shut and maybe then countries could actually solve immigration problems rationally in a way that pleases everyone.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52fc11356368723d9c8b0100#post_52fc11356368723d9c8b0100
I'm more concerned with preserving national character and identity than economics, which is why I'm opposed to mass immigration in Europe. Since those are native European countries with low birthrates, they are quite susceptible to losing their national character.

This does get me branded as racist because it acknowledges that one of the symptoms of being a native European is being 'white' among other things.

To which I must reply that Sikhs and Christian Arabs are both groups which are not white but pose no threat due to their responsible habits and being relatively small groups. So I can't be all that 'racist.'

Then the person I'm arguing with has to do what I call "making shit up" so they can continue to call me racist, in order to shame my opinions and preserve their self righteous attitude.
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52fc12b66368721427ff0000#post_52fc12b66368721427ff0000
What's ironic when you think about it is that here in the usa we have no national character cause we're literally a nation of immigrants.  Most of our population are from german descent or irish descent and people of african descent or hispanic descent are on the rise.  We have no clear cultural roots and yet we have people who honestly don't realize that the only true americans are native americans.  That would be like someone from europe moving to asia and then claiming they're a native asian saying that their family originates from asia.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52fc142a63687279413a0000#post_52fc142a63687279413a0000
well, I meant to say I mostly agree with you.
I'm not too concerned with America's national character even if I do believe in an enforced border (coupled with reform for the immigration and naturalization process in a spirited attempt to be fair).

But Europe is another story. I would be just as opposed to China accepting massive numbers of Non-Chinese immigrants.
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52fc16266368726abe570200#post_52fc16266368726abe570200
Why?  What's wrong with being of different cultural origins?

I'm part puerto rican, part german and part I think part portugal.  Is there something wrong with me for having different origins?  Is there something wrong with people of different cultural origins?
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52fc17236368725dda110000#post_52fc17236368725dda110000
Not necessarily. 
The concern with mass immigration into Europe are 1) too many people coming in 2) they're having too many kids and will replace the natives as the majority and 3) they have their own culture that they prefer to European culture.

So the end result is Europeans and European culture being replaced within their own countries with nowhere else for it to go.
Kind of a big fuck you when Western Civilization created the modern world.

As for America, I don't really care. My enforced border is simply to keep out the bad elements and the reformed immigration process is to help the good elements find a way in.
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f
